<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Copy existing Record producer field values to Record producers field on upgrade.
Assign Case table value in Workplace Service.
Assign Task table value in Workplace Service Activity.</description>
        <name>Set values in Service and Activity</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[populateRecordProducers();
assignCaseTableInWorkplaceService();
assignTaskTableInServiceActivity();

function populateRecordProducers() {
    gs.info('populateRecordProducers - Starting fix script to copy record producer value to record producers field in workplace Service');
    var wpServiceGr = new GlideRecord(WSDCaseConstants.TABLES.SERVICE);
    if (!wpServiceGr.isValidField("record_producer"))
        return;
    wpServiceGr.addNotNullQuery("record_producer");
    wpServiceGr.addNullQuery("record_producers");
    wpServiceGr.query();
    while (wpServiceGr.next()) {
        wpServiceGr.record_producers = wpServiceGr.record_producer;
        wpServiceGr.update();
    }
    gs.info('populateRecordProducers - Finishing fix script to copy record producer value to record producers field in workplace Service');
}

function assignCaseTableInWorkplaceService() {
    gs.info('assignCaseTableInWorkplaceService - Starting fix script to assign Case table value in workplace Service');
    var wpServiceGr = new GlideRecord(WSDCaseConstants.TABLES.SERVICE);
    wpServiceGr.addNullQuery("case_table");
    wpServiceGr.query();
    while (wpServiceGr.next()) {
        wpServiceGr.case_table = WSDCaseConstants.TABLES.CASE;
        wpServiceGr.update();
    }
    gs.info('assignCaseTableInWorkplaceService - Finishing fix script to assign Case table value in workplace Service');
}

function assignTaskTableInServiceActivity() {
    gs.info('assignTaskTableInServiceActivity - Starting fix script to assign value to Task table in Workplace Service Activity');
    var wpServiceActivityGr = new GlideRecord(WSDCaseConstants.TABLES.SERVICE_ACTIVITY);
    wpServiceActivityGr.getValue("activity_type", WSDCaseConstants.ACTIVITY_TYPE.TASK);
    wpServiceActivityGr.addNullQuery("task_table");
    wpServiceActivityGr.query();
    while (wpServiceActivityGr.next()) {
        wpServiceActivityGr.task_table = sn_wsd_core.WPConstants.TABLES.WORKPLACE_TASK;
        wpServiceActivityGr.update();
    }
    gs.info('assignTaskTableInServiceActivity - Finishing fix script to assign value to Task table in Workplace Service Activity');
}]]></script>
